entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of drizzle or rain. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing late this evening and dissipating before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
